# Production keep: src/, include/, platformio.ini, requirements.txt

  _junkyard/main.cpp
  _junkyard/monitor.py
  _junkyard/README.txt

## Optional (remove manually if you want a minimal root)
# .pio/                         (PlatformIO build cache; regenerated by pio run)
# build_oneclick.bat            (replaced by INSTALL_AND_RUN.bat)
# run_monitor.bat               (replaced by INSTALL_AND_RUN.bat / EMERGENCY_START.bat)
# run_monitor.vbs
# monitor.spec                  (PyInstaller; not required for tray run)
# AUTOSTART.md, CHANGELOG.md, FIRST_START.md, NOCTURNE_OS.md, PROTOCOL.md, README.md, V6_SUMMARY.md, VERIFICATION.md
# config.json.example           (setup_nocturne.py creates config.json from template)
# .env.example                  (optional env override)
# lib/README, test/README        (placeholder)

## Kept

requirements.txt
